vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of United Monarchy, only mentioned at 2Sa.21.19;
son of: Rapha (H7497A);
brother of: Goliath (H1555), Ishbi-benob (H3430), Saph (H5593), huge_man (H4060A); also translated "[brother of] Goliath" at 2Sa.21.16;
§ Lahmi = "my bread"
brother of Goliath the Gittite and slain by Elhanan the son of Zair
vocabInfos._es_Definition: de Gat; hermano de Goliat; filisteo
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
拉哈米 这个陽性專有名詞在希伯來文的意思是 "我的麵包"
迦特人歌利亞的兄弟, 被睚珥的兒子伊勒哈難所擊殺 (代上20:5)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
拉哈米 这个阳性专有名词在希伯来文的意思是 "我的面包"
迦特人歌利亚的兄弟, 被睚珥的儿子伊勒哈难所击杀 (代上20:5)
